data.text: @jp1kiwi @kristinhallNZ I’ll be more careful about irony in the future! Twitter is too blunt an instrument! 🤔

@John34677673 @kristinhallNZ My tweet may have been a bit subtle. Mine was a feeble attempt at being ironic. I think deliberately spreading the virus is abhorrent. I have not time for the protesters or their many causes.

@krisdov @funstigator @kristinhallNZ Following vaccination, innate immune cells had a reduced response to toll-like receptor 4 (TLR4), TLR7 and TLR8 – all ligands that play an important role in the immune response to viral infection.
https://t.co/jDbMHUMCbX https://t.co/4f5LN1pOms

@BeCivilKind @funstigator @Mesikazejanism @darengineer @ScientistBlood @kristinhallNZ Give up. Because those horrible vaccines have not been proven to be safe - yet. Should read the Pfizer docs and let us know how you go.

@HaydenBOP @DonnaJoy99 @kristinhallNZ Well since this post, my little sister has got covid and now is struggling to breathe so people should be concerned with infecting others... thanks!! 😡
